General.Name: Altri SGPS SA
General.Description: Altri, SGPS, S.A. produces and sells cellulosic fibers and energy in Portugal and internationally. The company produces pulp products for various application including production of paper, tissue, and printing and writing papers; and dissolving pulp for use of textile production. It is also involved timber commercialization; forest management; production of forest-based renewable energy, such as industrial cogeneration from black liquor and biomass; real estate activities; and production of plants in nurseries, as well as the provision of services related with forests and landscapes. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.
General.Address: Rua Manuel Pinto de Azevedo, 818, Porto, Portugal, 4100-320
